original_text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet, and besought him, saying, Have patience with me, and I will pay thee all.
korean_text: 그 동료가 엎드려 간구하여 이르되 나에게 참아 주소서 갚으리이다 하되

sentences.original_text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 동료 종이 그의 발 앞에 엎드렸고

sentences.original_text: and I will pay thee all
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 당신에게 모든 것을 갚겠습니다
